title: Split class into 4 new classes
message_prompt: Break Navigation into 4 components, and define all styles in-line: LogoButton, SearchBar and MagicWandButton. Keep them in the same file for now.
message_edit:
I will refactor the `Navigation` component by breaking it into three smaller components: `LogoButton`, `SearchBar`, and `MagicWandButton`. Each component will have its styles defined inline within the component itself. The `Navigation` component will then use these new components.

Steps:
1. Create `LogoButton` component with inline styles.
2. Create `SearchBar` component with inline styles.
3. Create `MagicWandButton` component with inline styles.
4. Refactor `Navigation` component to use the new components.
